metadata.title: CVE-2020-26140 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the ALFA Windows 10 driver 6.1316.1209 forAWUS036H. The WEP, WPA, WPA2, and WPA3 implementations accept plaintextframes in a protected Wi-Fi network. An adversary can abuse this to injectarbitrary data frames independent of the network configuration.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
